Please have your room key ready to show the shuttle driver. this is your ticket onto the shuttle.

pick ups from the seaport will be every half hour starting at 8:30am, last pick up will be at 11:00pm at 201 william street

FROM THE HOTEL, THE SHUTTLE RUNS EVERY HOUR ON THE HOUR STARTING AT 8AM, LAST PICKUP IS AT 10PM. TO ENSURE YOU REACH YOUR DESTINATION ON TIME, PLEASE ENSURE TO PLAN ACCORDINGLY.
